iconSearchDebounce.title: Search Debounce
iconSearchDebounce.description: Icon search debounce delay, in milliseconds, default 300ms, minimum 200ms

enableIconHint.title: Enable Document Icon Insertion
enableIconHint.description: Enable document icon insertion, triggered by input like `:home`, enabled by default; can be turned off if it affects typing

newIconHintDelay.title: New Icon Insertion Delay
newIconHintDelay.description: When inserting a new icon into the document, a delay is needed to wait for the icon to be saved, otherwise it won't display. In milliseconds, default 300ms, minimum 100ms
